sentences.sentence: "My knee is responding well so I'm obviously very happy," Contador said.
sentences.translation: “我的膝盖反应很好，所以我非常开心，”康塔多说。

sentences.sentence: Contador is training this week with his team on the Spanish Balearic island of Majorca.
sentences.translation: 康塔多本周仍在西班牙马略卡的巴里阿里群岛与队友一起训练。
